title: BBC Local Live: Essex Tuesday, 16 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: the crown prosecution service is intending to go ahead with a murder trial of a teenager charged with killing two people in colchester .
a 13-year-old boy dies after being hit by a car in basildon .
several army families in colchester have been without heating or hot water on one of the coldest nights of the year .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for essex live have finished for today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back tomorrow morning from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .

documents.title: flowers left at crash scene where boy , 13 , died
text: tributes have been paid to a 13-year-old boy who died after he was knocked down by a car in basildon last night .

i 've been to the part of the a127 where the accident happened , and several bunches of flowers have been left , with messages saying `` rest in peace '' and that the teenager was `` taken way too soon '' .
police have appealed for witnesses or anyone with information to contact them .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : dry with risk of frost
text: it 'll be a dry night with cloud increasing gradually from the west .
it wo n't be as cold as last night but there 's still the risk of a frost as temperatures fall just below freezing .
lows of -1c ( 30f )
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: police investigate alleged attack on tommy robinson
text: essex police is investigating an alleged attack on the former leader of the english defence league , tommy robinson .
officers were called to man with a head injury on the high street in epping over the weekend .
mr robinson 's spokesperson posted on facebook to say he 'd been on a night out with his wife when he was assaulted .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : teen set to face murder trial man jailed for causing death by dangerous driving
text: here are the top stories we 're covering this evening :
author: Claire Gregory
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex listeners meet mep
text: david cameron is in brussels to drum up european parliament support for his eu reform demands , ahead of a key summit .
and he 's not the only one - i 've taken two bbc essex listeners there to find out what reform would mean to them .
here they are meeting richard howitt , mep for east of england .
we 'll bring you more on their adventure here on the essex live page and on bbc essex .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: man jailed for causing death by dangerous driving
text: a man has been jailed for three years and eight months after being convicted of causing the death of his 22-year-old friend by dangerous driving in rayleigh last year .
christopher scott , 32 , from rochford ( left ) drove his bmw into a telegraph pole in january last year , killing oliver king ( right ) who was his passenger .
mr king 's mother described her son as `` handsome , with a beautiful physique , a tremendous wit and so caring '' .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man charged after car crashes into kitchen
text: a man has been charged after a car struck a house in braintree , causing serious damage .
homeowner david skeates was sitting in his lounge with his family in twelve acres , braintree , when a car smashed into his kitchen on 17 december .

a 24-year-old man from laindon was arrested yesterday and charged with careless driving , failing to report an accident , failing to stop after an accident and driving without insurance - he 'll appear at colchester magistrates ' court next month .
author: Claire Gregory
BBC Essex

documents.title: cps made decision to pursue trial after psychiatric report
text: a source from the crown prosecution service ( cps ) has been talking to me about the decision to put a teenager on trial for two murders in colchester .

james attfield , 33 , was stabbed to death near the town 's castle park in march 2014 , and student nahid almanea , 31 , was fatally attacked a few weeks later near the university of essex , triggering one of essex police 's biggest investigations .

a 17-year-old appeared at the old bailey last month , where mr justice spence told the cps it needed to decide whether to accept the defendant 's plea of manslaughter or to put him on trial for murder .
the trial will take place in guildford in april , after the cps decided to pursue the murder charges following a report from its own psychiatric expert .
author: Gareth George
BBC Look East

documents.title: two men sought after hammer robbery at westcliff corner shop
text: police are looking for two men who robbed a newsagent 's shop in westcliff on monday evening , threatening staff with a hammer .
hundreds of pounds were taken from the till by suspects described by police as white , aged about 25 to 30 years old , and about 6ft tall .
they fled from the robbery scene in ronald park avenue in the direction of roots hall stadium .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: grays ' littered beach condemned as one of 'dirtiest ' in uk
text: grays beach in thurrock has been named and shamed by campaigners clean for the queen as one of uk 's dirtiest areas .
campaign director adrian evans said it was a local eyesore because rubbish was being dumped by people `` who ca n't be bothered to dispose of it responsibly '' .
in order to clear up the mess , the team wants to hear from individuals , groups , schools , companies or sports teams keen to litter .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: driving instructor calls for more patience on the roads
text: driving instructor christopher barnett says people need more patience on the road , after he was attacked during a road rage incident when his learner driver stalled .
`` as i went to phone the police , he slammed the door on my arm and then he walked away , '' he said .
`` i 've been doing this for 36 years now , and there 's always been mild aggression , but i think it has got worse because there 's more traffic on the road . ''
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: southend travel to bradford as boss marks 150th match in charge
text: southend are going to take on bradford city at valley parade tonight as manager phil brown marks his 150th match in charge .
brown said he would make changes to his team to ensure `` energy and quality levels '' were better than on saturday when the blues lost 1-0 away to scunthorpe .
`` we 're looking for a side that 's going to go out there and represent southend united to the best of their ability , '' he said .

documents.title: travel : delays on m25 after lorry crash
text: an accident involving a number of lorries means two lanes on the m25 have been closed anti-clockwise at junction 31 for west thurrock .
delays are back to junction three for the m20 in kent .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : dry with sunny spells this afternoon
text: a fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine but chilly this evening with a frost developing once again .
maximum temperature : 7c ( 45f ) .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : charges set to be brought over colchester stab murders boy dies after car crash on a127
text: if you 're catching up , here are the stories we 've been looking at :
author: Claire Gregory
BBC Essex

documents.title: driving instructor concerned about road rage
text: a driving instructor from braintree says road rage incidents are on the rise , after he was attacked during a lesson .
christopher barnett 's arm was broken in the attack , after another driver , jamie kilmurray , ( not a car door on it .
a dashboard camera captured the incident .
kilmurray admitted assault occasioning actual bodily harm .
he was sentenced to 10 weeks in jail , suspended for 12 months , and was ordered to pay compensation .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: time running out for colchester
text: colchester united take on chesterfield at the weston homes community stadium tonight , in a match rearranged from the end of january .
both teams know they need three points to help pull them clear of trouble , with the season entering its final third .
the u 's are still without alex gilbey , who serves the second game of his suspension , along with alex wynter and marvin sordell , who are absent through injury .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: man jailed for fracturing pub-goer 's skull with pool cue
text: a 27-year-old man who attacked a pub-goer with a pool cue , leaving him with a fractured skull , has been jailed for six years and eight months .
lloyd kenlen pleaded guilty to wounding with intent to do grievous bodily harm in relation to the attack on a 34-year-old man at the red beret pub , in chelmsford , last july .
in an unprovoked attack , kenlen followed the victim out of the pub and struck him on the head with a pool cue and then kicked and punched him to the ground .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: teenager set to face murder trial over james attfield and nahid almanea deaths
text: i understand the crown prosecution service is set to pursue murder charges against a 17-year-old boy over the deaths of james attfield and nahid almanea in colchester .
mr attfield , 33 , died after being found with more than 100 knife wounds near the town 's castle park in march 2014 .
university of essex student ms almanea , 31 , was stabbed 16 times as she walked to a lecture weeks later .

the daily gazette , which reported the story earlier today , said the trial of the teenager , who denies murder but admits two counts of manslaughter by reason of diminished responsibility , would take place in april .
author: Gareth George
BBC Look East

documents.title: breakingboy , 17 , to face murder trial over colchester deaths
text: the crown prosecution service is intending to go ahead with a murder trial of a teenager charged with killing two people in colchester , the bbc understands .
james attfield , 33 , and student nahid almanea , 31 , were stabbed to death in separate attacks in the town in 2014 .
the 17-year-old , who can not be named because of his age , denies murder but admitted two counts of manslaughter by reason of diminished responsibility during a hearing last month .

documents.title: your a frosty start in woodham ferrers
text: if , like me , you were furiously scraping your windscreen this morning , you might not have noticed what a beautiful start to the day it was .
weather watcher tom freeman did notice , though , and captured this stunning image in woodham ferrers .
we 're using it at the top of our essex live page today - if you 've got a you think we could use , please email it to us .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: ronnie o'sullivan criticised after turning down 'too cheap ' 147 at welsh open
text: barry hearn , the chairman of world snooker , said ronnie o'sullivan `` stepped over the line '' between `` genius '' and `` madness '' in failing to complete a 147 break because the prize pot was n't big enough .
hearn described the chigwell player 's actions at the welsh open as `` unacceptable '' and `` disrespectful '' .
`` players have a duty to the fans to deliver the best standard and entertainment they can .
anything less than playing to their best ability is unacceptable and disrespectful to the paying public , '' he said .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: army families have no heating
text: a number of army families in colchester are living without any heating or hot water because their boilers are broken , the bbc has learned .
the number of complaints from service personnel and their families across the uk rose to more than 2500 in the six months from january to june last year .
the work is managed by the firm carillionamey , which said it was working hard to address problems and complete 25,000 maintenance jobs per month .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: meet the bbc essex listeners heading to brussels
text: david cameron is in brussels today hoping to win more support for his proposals to change britain 's relationship with the european union .
i 'm taking two bbc essex listeners to brussels today to find out what it really means for the public :
meet pauline & emily .
they 're bbc essex listeners who 're going to # brussels to get answers about the # euref
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: police appeal for witnesses after 13-year-old dies in collision
text: police have appealed for witnesses after a 13-year-old boy was hit by a car last night before being taken to basildon hospital where he was pronounced dead .
both carriageways of the a127 near basildon were closed for investigations and not reopened until 00:15 this morning .
a 31-year-old driver from southend was arrested and bailed pending further inquiries .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : cold and frosty start
text: it will be cold and frosty at first , with some mist or fog patches , but things will improve during the morning to leave a fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine .
maximum temperature : 7c ( 45f )
watch the full forecast here .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : boy , 13 , dies after being hit by a car in basildon grays beach named and shamed
text: here are some of the stories we 're covering this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: disruption for rail passengers
text: some services that go through essex to london liverpool street are disrupted this morning due to problems at ipswich station .
greater anglia
greateranglia
# ipswich - network rail engineers are on site and working as quickly as possible on the repair on the track on platform 2 .
kb
# ipswich - network rail engineers are on site and working as quickly as possible on the repair on the track on platform 2 .
kb
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: boy , 13 , dies after being hit by car
text: a 13-year-old boy has died after being hit by a car in basildon .

police were called to the southend-bound carriageway of the a127 in basildon , near the junction with the a132 , just after 20:00 last night to reports a pedestrian and a bmw car had been involved in a crash .
a 31-year-old man from southend was arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m25 delays after vehicle break-down
text: there 's heavy traffic on the m25 clockwise at the qe2 bridge , because of an earlier broken-down vehicle .
congestion to j30 , a13 ( lakeside ) .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello !
i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across essex today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live
